entities.description: Spent a great deal of time using or feeling the effects of alcohol in the past 12 months.
Spent a great deal of time trying to get or getting alcohol in the past 12 months.
Drank alcohol in larger amounts or for longer periods of time than intended in the past 12 months.
Wanted to use alcohol so badly that it affected thoughts or actions in the past 12 months.

relationships.description: Indicates the respondent's experience with spending a great deal of time using or feeling the effects of alcohol.
Indicates the respondent's experience with spending a great deal of time trying to get or getting alcohol.
Indicates the respondent's experience with drinking alcohol in larger amounts or for longer periods than intended.
Indicates the respondent's intense desire to use alcohol affecting thoughts or actions.
